title: Motion of two particles from position functions part - b

content.question: For 0≤t≤6 , find all times t during which the two particles travel in opposite directions.

frqParts.text: For 0≤t≤6 , find all times t during which the two particles travel in opposite directions.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
